verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H935>"Enter<s%> the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> you and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1004>household;<s%> for you [alone] I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> [to be] <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1755>time.<s%>

"You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> with you of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> by <S%H7651>sevens,<s%> a <S%H376>male<s%> and his <S%H802>female;<s%> and of the <S%H929>animals<s%> that are not <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H8147>two,<s%> a <S%H376>male<s%> and his <S%H802>female;<s%>

<S%H1571>also<s%> of the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> by <S%H7651>sevens,<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female,<s%> to <S%H2421>keep<s%> <S%H2233>offspring<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"For after <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> I will <S%H4305>send<s%> <S%H4305>rain<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights;<s%> and I will <S%H4229>blot<s%> out from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3351>living<s%> <S%H3351>thing<s%> that I have <S%H6213>made.<s%>"
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.
Now <S%H5146>Noah<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when the <S%H3999>flood<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Then <S%H5146>Noah<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> and his sons' <S%H802>wives<s%> with him <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H3999>flood.<s%>

Of <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>animals<s%> and <S%H929>animals<s%> that are not <S%H2889>clean<s%> and <S%H5775>birds<s%> and <S%H3605>everything<s%> that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H127>ground,<s%>
there <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H8392>ark<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah<s%> by <S%H8147>twos,<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female,<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5146>Noah.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about after the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H3999>flood<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

In the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundredth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of Noah's <S%H9132>life,<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H7651>seventeenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4599>fountains<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H1234>burst<s%> <S%H1234>open,<s%> and the <S%H699>floodgates<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> were <S%H6605>opened.<s%>
And the <S%H1653>rain<s%> <S%H1961>fell<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> for <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights.<s%>

On the <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> and <S%H8035>Shem<s%> and <S%H2526>Ham<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> and Noah's <S%H802>wife<s%> and the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with them, <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H8392>ark,<s%>

they and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>cattle<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3671>sorts<s%> of <S%H6833>birds.<s%>

So they <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H8392>ark<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> by <S%H8147>twos<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> was the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H9132>life.<s%>

And those that <S%H935>entered,<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5462>closed<s%> [it] <S%H1157>behind<s%> him.

Then the <S%H3999>flood<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> for <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H7235>increased<s%> and <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> so that it <S%H7311>rose<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> and <S%H7235>increased<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H1980>floated<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> <S%H3966>more<s%> and <S%H3966>more<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth,<s%> so that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H3605>everywhere<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> were <S%H3680>covered.<s%>
The <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H4605>higher,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H3680>covered.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that <S%H7430>moved<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1478>perished,<s%> <S%H5775>birds<s%> and <S%H929>cattle<s%> and <S%H9130>beasts<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8318>swarming<s%> <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>swarms<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>mankind;<s%>

of <S%H3605>all<s%> that was on the <S%H2724>dry<s%> <S%H2724>land,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H639>nostrils<s%> was the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H9132>life,<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%>

Thus He <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3351>living<s%> <S%H3351>thing<s%> that was upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>land,<s%> from <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H929>animals<s%> to <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7431>things<s%> and to <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and they were <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out from the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> was <S%H7604>left,<s%> together with those that were with him in the <S%H8392>ark.<s%>
And the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
